img_text: Oh, not all feminists are like that? Morgan Solanas Dworkin "I want to see a man beaten to a bloody pulp with a high-heel shoved in his mouth Ike an apple in the mouth of a pig "I feel that man-hating is an honourable and vable polctical act, that the oppressed have a right to class-hatred against the class that is oppressing them To call a man an animal is to flatter him; he's a machine, a walking dldo Jeffereys Mckinnon Gordon e nuclear family must be destroy whatever it's utimate meaning, the break up of families is now an objectively revolutionary process" "When a woman reaches orgasm with a man, she is only collaborating with the patriarchal system, eroticising her own oppression" All sex, even consensual sex between a married couple is an act of violence perpertrated against a woman" So those who's ideas feminism is built upon are like that, but you're not?
